description:
The world’s leading shopping app for finding women’s designer fashion, shoes, handbags & accessories. Shop millions of fashion products from all the stores and brands you love, all in one place. Easily search and compare styles & prices across both local and online stores. 

We work closely with thousands of top fashion retail partners, that range from local boutique gems to global brands and retailers, to create the largest single destination to find fashion products available in both nearby stores and online. 

The Snapette app is designed by women for women.

What the press is saying about Snapette: 

- "Introducing Snapette—part Instagram, part Pinterest, all awesome" – InStyle 
- "The Next Big Thing in Tech” – Fashion 2.0 Awards 
- "Snapette Redefines the Shopping Experience" – Yahoo Finance 
- A “Top 10 Must-Have Fashion App” – International Business Times 
- “Your ultimate snap-happy shopping companion” – Refinery29 
- “Another reason to stayed glued to your phone, constantly” – Racked 


Fashionistas have commonly searched for us under the names Snappette, Snapit, Snappit, Snap it and Snappitt.
releaseNotes:
- Search and Filter 1000s of trending and on-sale designer fashion products with our new search feature

- Get real-time alerts on your phone about new stores, special discounts and exclusive giveaways from over 750 designer brands & stores

- Our product catalogue has expanded to include 100s of global brands and retailers.
